changeSet.createView: SELECT w.name AS workspace, wa.key AS wsp_key, wa.description AS wsp_desc, a.id, a.name, a.description, a.notes, a.inheritable, a.value_type, up.name AS updated_by, a.version FROM attribute a JOIN agency up ON a.updated_by = up.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.workspace_authorization wa ON a.workspace = wa.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.product w ON wa.defining_product = w.id
